mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.appid AS "appid", a.appsecret AS "appsecret", a.name AS "name", a.status AS "status", a.url AS "url", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.atime AS "atime", a.mtime AS "mtime"
mapper.select: select id , name as value from oms_market_info where status=1

SELECT
FROM oms_market_info a
AND a.name LIKE '%'||#{name}||'%' '%'+#{name}+'%' concat('%',#{name},'%')
ORDER BY ${page.orderBy}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO oms_market_info( id, appid, appsecret, name, status, url, remarks, atime, mtime ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{appid}, #{appsecret}, #{name}, #{status}, #{url}, #{remarks}, #{atime}, #{mtime} )
mapper.update: UPDATE oms_market_info SET appid = #{appid}, appsecret = #{appsecret}, name = #{name}, status = #{status}, url = #{url}, remarks = #{remarks}, atime = #{atime}, mtime = #{mtime} WHERE id = #{id}
